Step 1: Plan to bring @laurenhummfries her #gitonup tee on a weekend she's at school.
Step 2: Drive to St. Catharines to make that happen.
Step 3: Realize that Ravine Vineyard is 16 minutes from her place.
Step 4: Make a reservation while in her driveway.
Step 5: Enjoy. https://t.co/403dt3qW9u

Calvin comes home and says his group is doing a play for class tomorrow. He asks me for a black sheet or blanket because he is playing the role of Dracula. Seriously? Who am I? I pull out a black hooded cape from my cosplay section of my closet. He's set now.

When you plan an afternoon with me and you start it with a trip to a bookstore and a giftcard to buy books, I would say you know me.
RIP Stephen Hawking. Your mindset was light-years ahead. Your quest for the truth was continuous. You defied the odds at every turn. Rest now surrounded by the cosmos you sought to understand.
Sometimes I have to sit back and laugh at what people make up. My life is interesting enough. No need for embellishment.

Latest rumour making its way through the mill is that I'm a lesbian and that's the reason I'm outwardly single. For the record, I'm straight, private, and picky. Do I date? Yes. Do I broadcast who I date? No. If I'm single, it's by choice and not for lack of interest in me. https://t.co/eqdLy5RAxB

I just did a consult on the phone with my brother. My nephew has ADHD and there was a recommendation for prescribed medication. I asked a bevvy of questions and the team hadn't even thought of the strategies I offered. Meds are ALWAYS a last resort. I stand by that.
